title: Heera aur Manikya Latkan: Exquisite Diamond & Ruby Pendant
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Featuring a central cabochon Ruby (Manikyam) and carefully selected Polki Diamonds (Heera). High-quality craftsmanship ensuring durability.
features: A bold and striking design, this latkan features a central, cushion-cut ruby set within a diamond lattice. The surrounding Polki diamonds are set in a traditional closed setting to maximize their sparkle. The pendant exhibits a contemporary geometric design with subtle vintage styling. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish.
occasions: or to elevate any special occasion ensemble. Makes a statement for both traditional and modern outfits.
description: This exquisite pendant seamlessly blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a contemporary design. The deep red ruby is believed to bring prosperity and good health, while the Polki diamonds symbolize purity and strength. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensure that this piece will be cherished for generations. Owning this piece is an investment in both beauty and heritage.
